title: Macroeconomics 2 presentation  A review of “A Behavioral New Keynesian Model” of Xavier Gabaix
text:
Hello, we are Nayanika, Paulo and Shang, and this is the website of our Macroeconomics presentation, dedicated to the paper Gabaix, Xavier. 2020. “A Behavioral New Keynesian Model.” American Economic Review, 110 (8): 2271-2327.
Here are some useful resources :

The slides of our presentation
The final version of the paper presented
An additional description of the equations of the paper
The online appendix of the paper
